content: do not work round 4 i should have told you that earlier shouldn´t i o or if its to small repeat round 4 as often as needed you only have to work 1 more group of 3 double_crochet ch1 between the corners on every row you add from round 5 on we will not be working any corners so treat every chain-space of round 4 like a ch1-space round 5 13 attach yarn in any chain space and work chain 3 2 double_crochet ch1 *3 double_crochet chain 1* repeat from * to * 23 more times slip_stitch in top of chain 3 to close round fo weave in all ends =24 groups of 3dc-ch1 you should mesure while you crochet row 5-13 maybe you need more or less but you can try it by pulling the cover over your box from time to tome the cover should be about half a row or a row to long for the box chain 120 or more if needed fo weave this chain through the ch1-spaces of the last row pull tight and make a little bow well done o your tissue box cover is ready o this is a free pattern i made to share with everyone who wants to have it feel free to share it with friends and family but please do not sell for profit you can sell finished project if you want to but i think they are better as a gift o that´s what they made for o
